title: WTB Some easy T206 backs to check off on my new collection
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: WTB Some easy T206 backs to check off on my new collection
posts.post_content:
Hi guys,

I'm looking for some easier (?? :D) T206 backs to appease my OCD and check off my list for the new climb towards the Monster. Ideally, I'm looking for non-HOFers to keep the cost reasonable. Please shoot me a PM with your price(s) if you have any of these available***UPDATE -DOWN TO JUST TWO****:

SC 350-460/F42
Tolstoi

Thanks for looking! :D

Best,

Steve

Hi Steve,

I have sent you a PM regarding a card that I have available with a Sovereign 350 Forest Green back.

Thanks,
Jantz

Hi, Steve,

PM sent on a Sov 150 back. Email if you're interested: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url].

Cheers,
Mike

Thanks guys! I knocked the 2 Sovereigns off off my list!

Best,

Steve

Thanks to all, I'm down to just these two backs if anyone has a spare that they'd like to sell!

SC 350-460/F42
Tolstoi

Best,

Steve
